Package org.centrale.objet.WoE

Class Personnage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.centrale.objet.WoE.Creature
      • org.centrale.objet.WoE.Personnage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Archer, Guerrier, Paysan
    public class Personnage
extends Creature
    The class represents a human being in the world Under this Superclass, we can find subclasses such as warrior, archer, etc. This class has features such as the ability to move, attack and use items.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wu Zilong, Zou Kang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Personnage()
      Initialize a person without parameter
      Personnage​(String nom)
      Initializes a newly created Personnage object by one name So we just set the name of the person
      Personnage​(String nom, int ptVie, int degAtt, int ptPar, int pageAtt, int pagePar, int distAttMax, Point2D pos)
      Initializes a newly created Personnage object, so that it represents the same values of characters as the argument.
      Personnage​(Personnage perso)
      Initializes a person with a person object we use the object's name and disAttMax to initialize the new object
      Personnage​(Point2D p)

      void usagePotion​(PotionSoin p)
      The process of using potion first, we will check whether there is potion in Knapsack, if no, program will printout "no potion" if yes, potion will be moved out of knapsack, and set as null to be collect as garbage

                  Point2D pos)

        Parameters:
        nom -
        ptVie -
        degAtt - points of attack
        ptPar - points of defence
        pageAtt - pourcentageAtt
        pagePar - pourcentagePar
        distAttMax - longest distance it can attack
        pos -

      • usagePotion

        public void usagePotion​(PotionSoin p)
        The process of using potion first, we will check whether there is potion in Knapsack, if no, program will printout "no potion" if yes, potion will be moved out of knapsack, and set as null to be collect as garbage
        Parameters:
        p -

      • getPotionsoin

        public Vector<PotionSoin> getPotionsoin()

        Returns:
